name: The Light of Us
description:
You are The Light of Us! As the last Light Guardian alive you have a mission to collect light shards and return them to the kingdom gate!

Manage your surrounding light by staying alive & collecting light crystals, shoot light orbs to grow or shrink, platforms, rocks & doors. Look for buttons throughout the darkness to open different doors that don't open from your light. 

This game is extremely challenging & hard to actually beat!

This game was made for Mashup Game Jam & was our whole teams first time participating in a jam! With the theme being "Size Matters" we wound up focusing on the size of the light around us effecting game play as well as incorporating ways to shrink / grows doors / objects.

Controls: 

A/D Move
W Jump
LMB - Shoot Light Orb
E - Active Checkpoint
Esc - Exit Game 

(Cheat keys to explore ONLY IF YOU ARE STUCK!!!!!!)

"\" To enter fly mode with no collision (Control with arrow keys)

" ' " To exit cheat mode

Dev - Foleps
Art - Hunty
Music / Sounds - Pat Tambo
